entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4 except plus 2 inland.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
